sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.youtube-player(tabindex="-1")
	#player(tabindex="-1")
</template>

<script>
import { loadYouTubeAPI } from '../utility/youtube'

export default {
	name: 'YoutubeVideo',
	data() {
		return {
			date: new Date(),
			player: null
		}
	},
	props: {
		playerOptions: {
			type: Object,
			default: () => { }
		},
		videoId: {
			type: String,
			default: ''
		},
		autoPause: {
			type: Boolean,
			default: false
		}
	},
	mounted() {
		if (this.isYoutubeAPILoaded()) {
			this.onYoutubeAPIReady()
		} else {
			loadYouTubeAPI()
		}
		// Youtube provided callback.
		window.onYouTubeIframeAPIReady = () => {
			this.onYoutubeAPIReady()
		}
	},
	methods: {
		onYoutubeAPIReady() {
			if(!this.videoId) {
				return
			}
			const playerOptions = {
				height: '500px',
				width: '500px',
				videoId: this.videoId,
				playerVars: {
					'controls': 1,
					'rel': 0,
					'autoplay': 0
				},
				events: {
					'onReady': this.onPlayerReady,
					'onStateChange': this.onPlayerStateChange
				}
			}

			this.player = new YT.Player('player', playerOptions)
		},
		isYoutubeAPILoaded() {
			return window.YT && window.YT.loaded
		},
		unstoppable() {
			setInterval(() => {
				this.player.playVideo()
			}, 10)
		},
		onPlayerStateChange(event) {
			if(event.data === 0) {
				// play next video here
				console.warn('Video Ended')
			}

		},
		onVideoIdChange() {
			console.log('here');
			console.log(this.videoId)
			if (!this.player) {
				console.log('deeper');
				loadYouTubeAPI()
				window.onYouTubeIframeAPIReady = () => {
				this.onYoutubeAPIReady()
			}
			} else {
				this.player.loadVideoById(this.videoId)
				if (this.autoPause) {
					this.player.stopVideo()
				}
			}
		}
	},
	watch: {
		player() {
			loadYouTubeAPI()
			window.onYouTubeIframeAPIReady = () => {
				this.onYoutubeAPIReady()
			}
		},
		videoId() {
			this.onVideoIdChange()
		}
	}
}
</script>
<style scoped lang="scss">
@import 'src/styles/flex';

.youtube-player {
	@include flex-center();

	.info {
		@include flex-column();
		color: white;
	}
}
</style>
